description:
A fun and simple golf game anyone can enjoy.
Includes golf courses with up to 18 holes.
With support for 1-4 players, enjoy at your pace by yourself or have an exciting competition with your friends and family.
You can play with either the controller or by swinging the Joy-Con™.
name: The Golf
intro:
Get a nice shot using the buttons or the Joy-Con™!
A fun and easy golf game
